title: Glyphosate herbicide safety study retracted 25 years after publication
description: An influential research article that claimed a popular weed-killer was safe has been retracted 25 years after it was published, prompting environmental groups in Canada to ask the federal government to review the science on glyphosate use.
content:
Health Canada says its decision to approve a popular weed killer won't be affected by the retraction of a key research paper.
The 25-year-old study said the main ingredient in Roundup the herbicide … [+4965 chars]
